title: Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter Recipe
description: Air fry lobster tails until succulent and delicious; top with a lemon garlic butter sauce for an easy, fancy meal for two at home in just 10 minutes.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Seafood Shellfish Lobster Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter 4.8 (52) 38 Reviews 10 Photos Air fry lobster tails for an elegant meal for two at home. They come out succulent and meaty. Delicious with lemony garlic butter and parsley. Submitted by Allrecipes Updated on May 24, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 10 10 10 10 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 10 mins Total Time: 20 mins Servings: 2 Yield: 2 lobster tails Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 2 servings 2 (4 ounce) lobster tails 4 tablespoons butter 1 teaspoon lemon zest 1 clove garlic, grated salt and ground black pepper to taste 1 teaspoon chopped fresh parsley 2 wedges lemon Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat an air fryer to 380 degrees F (195 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Butterfly lobster tails by cutting lengthwise through the centers of the hard top shells and meat with kitchen shears. Cut to, but not through, the bottoms of the shells. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spread tail halves apart. Place tails in the air fryer basket with lobster meat facing up. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Melt butter in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add lemon zest and garlic; heat until garlic is fragrant, about 30 seconds. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Transfer 2 tablespoons of butter mixture to a small bowl; brush this onto lobster tails. Discard any remaining brushed butter to avoid contamination from uncooked lobster. Season lobster with salt and pepper. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cook in the preheated air fryer until lobster meat is opaque, 5 to 7 minutes. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Spoon reserved butter from the saucepan over lobster meat. Top with parsley and serve with lemon wedges. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Recipe Tip You can use frozen lobster tails, just thaw them first before proceeding with the instructions. I Made It Print 54 home cooks made it! Add Your Photo Photos of Air Fryer Lobster Tails with Lemon-Garlic Butter 01 of 10 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 10 Photo by  DHarper 11/03/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Great flavors Quick and delicious! 03 of 10 Photo by  DREGINEK 02/15/2023 This was WOW! Amazing! Basically made the butter mixture, swabbed the lobster with it, cooked for 2 min and re-applied - only to cook in the air fryer for another 5 min. This was PERFECT! Wow good! I agree - this might be the only way I make lobster moving forward. Thank you Allrecipes Team for a “holy $&&7!” Good recipe! 04 of 10 Photo by  Howard 02/17/2021 Oh yah! This was too easy and now my lobster tail go too!!! 05 of 10 Photo by  Cat 02/15/2021 Very easy to make, cake our delicious! 06 of 10 Photo by  Ruben Chio 02/15/2021 I'd make this again. The wife said it had great flavor and wasn't dry. The only thing I changed was the butter mixture and actually pulled the lobster from the shell and sat it in top of the shell. 07 of 10 Photo by  Ruben Chio 02/15/2021 I'd make this again. The wife said it had great flavor and wasn't dry. The only thing I changed was the butter mixture and actually pulled the lobster from the shell and sat it in top of the shell. 08 of 10 Photo by  MLONG63 01/02/2021 09 of 10 Photo by  Trusted Brands 01/16/2020 10 of 10 Photo by  Soup Loving Nicole 09/19/2019 Loved this! I will never cook lobster in anything other than an air fryer again! 1 You’ll Also Love Lemon-Garlic Air Fryer Salmon 22 Ratings Lemon Garlic Salmon 125 Ratings Baked Fish Fillets 27 Ratings Orange Lobster Tail 34 Ratings Meyer Lemon Cream Sauce for Salmon 10 Ratings Grilled Swordfish Steaks with Cilantro-Lime Butter 1 Rating Easy Garlic-Lemon Scallops 673 Ratings Broiled Salmon with Lemon and Dill 12 Ratings Easy Lemon Pepper Blackened Salmon 78 Ratings Steamed Salmon with Olives and Capers 2 Ratings Grilled Lobster Tails 487 Ratings Broiled Lobster Tails 474 Ratings Healthy Dijon Salmon for One 2 Ratings Sautéed Scallops 162 Ratings Simply Swordfish 92 Ratings Pan-Grilled Tilapia with Lemon and Red Onion 6 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
